name: Ladder
description:
Do you think that you have amazing reflexes? Well, think again! This game will challenge you in every instant, putting every reflex you ever bragged about, through the sternest of tests. We promise to push your boredom to a distant corner. Try us!

*Tap to place a ladder piece over the previous one as it keeps going up*
*Gather as many points as you can and show 'em off to your friends*
*Don't give up!*
*Full page ads are disabled once you get 40 points!*
Ads are there to support our work and keep all future apps free!

Have fun!
-----
